name: Oceanography
description: The world's oceans cover approximately 70% of the Earth Surface and Canada has extensive coastlines along three major ocean basins. This course will provide an understanding of chemical, biological, physical and geologic aspects of the oceans. Emphasis will be placed on the geological and geophysical processes that form and shape the ocean basins and continental margins. In addition, this course will offer an insight into the paleoceanographic evolution of our planet. [36L] ERS312H5 is offered in alternate years, alternating with ERS321H5.
prerequisites: One of: ERS201H5, ERS202H5, ERS203H5, GGR214H5, GGR217H5, GGR227H5
